tool_description: Identifies absolute and relative contraindications between prescribed medications and patient medical conditions.

specialty_focus.description: Clinical specialty context: cardiology, nephrology, hepatology, general

error_messages: Invalid medication list: Ensure all medications are correctly named and recognized.
Invalid medical conditions: Medical conditions must be valid ICD-10 codes or standard condition names.
Specialty not recognized: Use one of [cardiology, nephrology, hepatology, general].
Contraindication database error: Unable to access contraindication guidelines.
usage: Provide medications and medical_conditions arrays. Set specialty_focus for specialized contraindication checking and include_relative_contraindications for comprehensive assessment.
